titles.title: A bill to authorize the National Park Service to acquire up to 3 acres of lands to be used for a visitor site and administrative facilities for the Santa Monica Mountains National Recreation Area.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.

bill.summary: 10/29/1987--Introduced. Amends the National Parks and Recreation Act of 1978 to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to accept certain lands from the city of Agoura Hills, California, for use as a visitor center and administrative offices for the Santa Monica Mountains National Recreation Area.
